windows.command: if (-not (Test-Path '${command:cmake.buildDirectory}/CMakeCache.txt')) { Write-Host 'ERROR: CMake not configured!' -ForegroundColor Red; exit 1 }; cmake --build '${command:cmake.buildDirectory}' --config ${command:cmake.buildType} -- /m /nologo

linux.command: if [ ! -f '${command:cmake.buildDirectory}/CMakeCache.txt' ]; then echo 'ERROR: CMake not configured!'; exit 1; fi && cmake --build '${command:cmake.buildDirectory}' --config ${command:cmake.buildType} --parallel
